quote: “Your life can’t fall apart if you never had it together.”
author: unknown

quote: “When the going gets tough, the tough gets tougher.”
author: unknown

quote: “Life is hard, but it’s even harder if you’re stupid.”
author: unknown

quote: “Everyone has a purpose in life. Perhaps yours is watching television”
author: David Letterman

quote: “Life hack: you can’t do anything wrong if you don’t do anything at all.”
author: unknown

quote: “Life better be a destination because this journey sucks.”
author: unknown

quote: “You’re naturally funny because your life is a joke.”
author: unknown

quote: “The meaning of life is to find your gift. So good luck with that.”
author: unknown

quote: “Today will be a day like every other day.”
author: unknown

quote: “Life is pain. Anyone who says otherwise is selling something.”

quote: “When life knocks you down, stay there and take a nap.”
author: unknown

quote: “Life is what happens when you’re busy reading inspirational quotes.”
author: unknown

quote: “It’s not just Monday. Your whole life sucks.”

quote: “If you never try anything new, you’ll miss out on many of life’s great disappointments”
author: unknown

quote: “Everything is bad and everyone is dumb.”
author: unknown

quote: “You only die once.”
author: unknown

quote: “Carpe Nothing.”
author: unknown

quote: “Life is 10% what happens to you, and 90% how much money you have.”
author: unknown

quote: “Today is the first day of the rest of your life. But so was yesterday, and look how that turned out.”
author: unknown

quote: “Raise your hand if you have had quite enough unsolicited advice about what should be done with any lemons that life may or may not give you.”
author: unknown

quote: “It’s all downhill from here.”
author: unknown

quote: “Life’s a bitch, and then you die.”
author: unknown

quote: “Don’t rest until you’ve complained about everything.”
author: unknown

quote: “It could be that your purpose in life is to serve as a warning to others.”

quote: “It is what it is. And it’s not good.”
author: unknown

quote: “The worst things in your life probably haven’t happened to you yet.”
author: unknown

quote: “If the world didn’t suck we’d all fly into space.”
author: unknown

quote: “Life is a series of things we would rather not to.”

quote: “Some people are born losers, others have to learn the hard way.”
author: unknown

quote: “Quitters never win, and winners never quit talking about how they won.”
author: unknown

quote: “It’s never too late to fail.”
author: unknown

quote: “Try hard and don’t worry if you fail because everyone expected that.”
author: unknown

quote: “The road to success is always under construction.”

quote: “Started from the bottom and still at the bottom.”
author: unknown

quote: “You can have results or excuses. Excuses it is.”

quote: “There’s no limit to what you can be if you lie to yourself.”
author: unknown

quote: “Will it be easy? Nope. Worth it? Absolutely not!”
author: unknown

quote: “You tried your best and failed miserably. The lesson is, never try.”
author: Homer Simpson

quote: “The elevator to success is out of order. You’ll have to use the stairs, one step at a time.”

quote: “The first step toward failure is trying.”
author: unknown

quote: “Not everything is a lesson. Sometimes you just fail.”
author: unknown

quote: “Those who doubt your ability probably have a valid reason.”
author: unknown

quote: “You miss 100% of the shots you do take also.”
author: unknown

quote: “Every day is a new chance for you to screw up again.”
author: unknown

quote: “The only thing all of your failures have in common is you.”
author: unknown

quote: “There is always room in your life to fk more shit up. Always.”
author: unknown

quote: “Your life only goes up so you can fall from a new height.”
author: unknown

quote: “Boldly going nowhere.”
author: unknown

quote: “Nothing says ‘you’re a loser’ more than owning a motivational poster about being a winner.”
author: unknown

quote: “Go ahead and take risks, it gives the rest of us something to laugh at.”
author: unknown

quote: “Whoever said money can’t buy happiness didn’t know where to shop.”

quote: “Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won’t expect it back.”

quote: “Why is there so much month left at the end of the money?”

quote: “They say money talks. But, all mine says is goodbye.”
author: unknown

quote: “The best things in life are actually really expensive.”
author: unknown

quote: “Mo’ money, no problems.”
author: unknown

quote: “The only thing that has to be finished by next Tuesday is next Monday.”
author: Jennifer Yane

quote: “Every day is Friday when you’re unemployed.”
author: unknown

quote: “I always arrive late at the office, but I make up for it by leaving early”

quote: “It’s true hard work never killed anybody, but I figure, why take the chance?”
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: “When work feels overwhelming, remember that you’re going to die.”
author: unknown

quote: “Oh, you hate your job? Why didn’t you say so? There’s a support group for that. It’s called EVERYBODY, and they meet at the bar.”
author: Drew Carey

quote: “The reward for good work is more work”.
author: Francesca Elisia

quote: “There’s always someone on Youtube that can do it better than you.”
author: unknown

quote: “People who say they’ll give 110% don’t understand how percentages work.”
author: unknown

quote: “Meetings. None of us is as dumb as all of us.” “
author: unknown

quote: Work hard, complain harder.”
author: unknown

quote: “I don’t want to do things. Things suck.”
author: unknown

quote: “Is today over yet?”
author: unknown

quote: “It’s never too late to go back to bed.”
author: unknown

quote: “Hard work pays off eventually, but laziness pays off now.”
author: unknown

quote: “I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.”

quote: “Just imagine how terrible it might have been if we’d been at all competent.”

quote: “Everybody sucks at something.”
author: unknown

quote: “Monday hates you too.”
author: unknown

quote: “None of your emails are finding me well.”
author: unknown

quote: “You can be replaced.”
author: unknown

quote: “What a day!! Nothing happened and I was tired.”
author: unknown

quote: “I have better things to do with my time than my job.”
author: unknown

quote: “When a man tells you that he got rich through hard work, ask him: Whose?”
author: unknown

quote: “The brain is a wonderful organ; it starts working the moment you get up in the morning and does not stop until you get into the office.”
author: Robert Frost

quote: “Get to work, you aren’t being paid to believe in the power of your dreams.”
author: unknown

quote: “If you want to make God laugh, tell him about your plans.”
author: Woody Allen

quote: “Drop it like it’s your hopes and dreams.”
author: unknown

quote: “Ambition is a poor excuse for not having sense enough to be lazy.”
author: Charlie McCarthy

quote: “Dream Big, Set Goals. Write goals on a nice paper and never look at them again.”
author: unknown

quote: “I’m sick of following my dreams. I’m just going to ask them where they’re going and hook up with them later.”

quote: “Every morning wake up and scream your dreams into a garbage can where they belong.”
author: unknown

quote: “Dreams are like rainbows. Only idiots chase them.”
author: unknown

quote: “Never. Give up.”
author: unknown

quote: “Reach for the stars! Follow your dreams! Live with your parents!”
author: unknown

quote: “Failure is always an option.”
author: unknown

quote: “Dream big. Then settle.”
author: unknown

quote: “If you never believe in yourself, you’ll never let yourself down.”
author: unknown

quote: “Go ahead let your dreams punch you in the face.”
author: unknown

quote: “Don’t start believin’.”
author: unknown

quote: “Start each day with a goal so you have something to fk up.”

quote: “My five year plan is to watch everything on Netflix.”

quote: “Mediocrity in your goals is the key to never falling short of your expectations.”
author: unknown

quote: “Perseverance is the ability to think you’re not an idiot despite the overwhelming evidence to the contrary.”
author: unknown

quote: “Dream big… But from bed.”
author: unknown

quote: “Dream, the first thing people abandon when they understand how the world works.”
author: unknown

quote: “I love hating things.”
author: unknown

quote: “I wouldn’t even settle for me, so why would you?”

quote: “Find the one thing you love and shut up about it.”
author: unknown

quote: “Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight.”

quote: “Does anyone want to be in love so we can split rent?”
author: unknown

quote: “True love is when two people lower their standards just the right amount.”
author: unknown

quote: “Date someone who is too good for you and pray they never find out.”
author: unknown

quote: “There’s someone for everyone, except for you.”
author: unknown

quote: “He loved asses so much he became one.”
author: unknown

quote: “I would break-up with myself if I could.”
author: unknown

quote: “Eat that cake because it’s somebody’s birthday somewhere.”
author: unknown

quote: “Shutting the fk up is gluten-free. Add that to your diet.”
author: unknown

quote: “I thought about losing weight once, but I don’t like losing.”
author: unknown

quote: “Eat like no one is going to see you naked.”
author: unknown

quote: “You’re about to get even fatter.”
author: unknown

quote: “Nobody gives a sht about what you ate for lunch.”
author: unknown

quote: “Please shut up about your workout.”
author: unknown

quote: “The more you weigh, the harder you are to kidnap. Stay safe. Eat cake.”
author: unknown

quote: “The best way to lose weight is to only eat inspirational quotes.”
author: unknown

quote: “Eat healthy, stay fit, die anyway.”
author: unknown

quote: “No one gives a sht about your diet. Just shut up, eat your lettuce and be sad.”

quote: “By replacing your morning coffee with green tea, you can loose up to 87% of what little joy you still have left in your life.”
author: unknown

quote: “There’s no “U” in “Happy”.”
author: unknown

quote: “Turn that smile upside down.”
author: unknown

quote: “Don’t let the bastards cheer you up.”
author: unknown

quote: “I don’t smile in pictures because I’m not a liar.”
author: unknown

quote: “Happiness is just a lack of information.”
author: unknown

quote: “If you’re happy and you know it no one cares.”
author: unknown

quote: “The key to happiness is low expectations. Lower. Nope, even lower. There you go.”
author: unknown

quote: “Always believe that something wonderful will probably never happen.”
author: unknown

quote: “Due to recent cutbacks, the light at the end of the tunnel has been turned off.”
author: unknown

quote: “It will probably get worse.”
author: unknown

quote: “We’re doomed.”
author: unknown

quote: “No one in charge of your happiness but you. But should you really be put in charge of anything?”
author: unknown

quote: “According to Astronomy, when you wish upon a star, you’re actually a few million years too late. That star is dead. Just like your dreams.”
author: unknown

quote: “Hope is the first step on the road to disappointment.”
author: Cassern S. Goto

quote: “The only way to save the planet is to stop making new people.”
author: unknown

quote: “The universe doesn’t give a sht about you.”
author: unknown

quote: “This too shall pass and come back worse.”
author: unknown

quote: “Until you spread your wings, you’ll have no idea how far you can walk.”
author: unknown

quote: “The two most common elements in the universe are hydrogen and stupidity.”
author: Harlan Ellison

quote: “The only reason some people get lost in thought is because it’s unfamiliar territory.”
author: Paul Fix

quote: “I have learned from my mistakes, and I am sure I can repeat them exactly.”
author: Peter Cook

quote: “Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence in society.”
author: Mark Twain

quote: “Always remember that you are unique, just like everybody else.”
author: Margaret Mead

quote: “Go to heaven for the climate and hell for the company.”
author: Benjamin Franklin Wade

quote: “Every tattoo is temporary, because we’re all slowly dying.”
author: unknown

quote: “I am free of all prejudice. I hate everyone equally.”
author: W.C. Fields

quote: “Think of how stupid the average person is, and realize half of them are stupider than that.”
author: George Carlin

quote: “Everything happens for a reason. Sometimes the reason is that you’re stupid and make bad decisions.”
author: Marion G. Harmon

quote: “Welcome to adulthood. I hope you like Ibuprofen.”
author: unknown

quote: “There are two types of people in the world and I hate both of them.”
author: unknown

quote: “Ninety five percent of conversations are an unbelievable waste of time.”
author: unknown

quote: “Most people are idiots. There’s nothing worse than idiots who tell you their opinions.”
author: Richard Kadrey

quote: “Never underestimate the power of stupid people in large groups.”
author: unknown

quote: “I’m sure the universe is full of intelligent life. It’s just been too intelligent to come here.”

quote: “Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I’m not sure about the universe.”
author: Albert Einstein

quote: “Humans are 85% water and 15% of idiot meat.”
author: unknown

quote: “Prove them wrong. Show them how much worse than what they think you actually are.”
author: unknown

quote: “People are really great as long as you don’t get to know them.”
author: unknown

quote: “When someone says you’re one in a million, what they’re really saying is that there’s over 7000 people just like you.”
author: unknown

quote: “I can but I literally refuse to even.”
author: unknown

quote: “Can stop, will stop.”
author: unknown

quote: “You’re only as deep as your most recent inspirational quote.”
author: unknown

quote: “There is no sunrise so beautiful that it is worth waking me up to see it.”
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: “Everyone’s entitled to their very stupid opinion.”
author: unknown

quote: “The only thing worse than mornings are “morning people”.”
author: unknown

quote: “Killing someone with kindness sounds like a lot of work to me.”
author: unknown

quote: “You’re only as good as your last fk-up.”
author: unknown

quote: “Why stand out when you’re born to blend in?”
author: unknown

quote: “It’s a beautiful day to leave me alone.”
author: unknown

quote: “Complaining is my hobby.”
author: unknown

quote: “Going outside is highly overrated.”

quote: “If fkig up is power, I should be the Hulk by now.”

quote: “Have a great day! Or don’t! No one cares!”

quote: “If you put an inspirational quote under your selfie, no one can see your narcissism.”

quote: “Get lost in nature and you will quite possibly die.”
author: unknown

quote: “It’s too early to be alive.”
author: unknown

quote: “I’d rather be sleeping.”
author: unknown

quote: “A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.”
author: unknown

quote: “Be the piece of sht you want to be, not the piece of sht everyone thinks you are.”

quote: “There is no problem so big you can’t run away from it.”

quote: “Have no fear of perfection. You’ll never reach it.”

quote: “Honesty is the best policy to pretend you believe in.”

quote: “Others can’t use you if you’re useless.”
author: unknown

quote: “When in doubt, chicken out.”
author: unknown

quote: “Never miss a good chance to shut up.”

quote: “Be yourself. No one else wants to be you.”
author: unknown

quote: “Better to remain silent and be thought a fool than to speak out and remove all doubt.”

quote: “Keep panicking.”
author: unknown

quote: “Every group needs its twat, and if you’re in a group of people and there isn’t a twat, then it’s you.”

quote: “Practice makes perfect, but if nobody’s perfect, why practice?”

quote: “Just because you’re paranoid, doesn’t mean they’re not after you.”
author: unknown

quote: “Two wrongs don’t make a right, but they make a good excuse.”
author: Thomas Stephen Szasz

quote: “Don’t cry because it’s over. Smile because if you don’t, everyone will ask you what’s wrong.”

quote: “If everything seems to be going well, you have obviously overlooked something.”

quote: “It’s a beautiful day to shut up.”

quote: “There’s always time to complain.”
author: unknown

quote: “Be yourself, everyone else is already a twat.”
author: unknown

quote: “Before you judge someone else, try to keep in mind that you’re probably a piece of sht too.”

quote: “Every bad thing that happens today is a direct result of choosing to get out of bed.”

quote: “You did not wake up like that.”
author: unknown

quote: “You put the ace in disgrace.”
author: unknown

quote: “Coffee doesn’t love you back.”
author: unknown

quote: “Your dog only loves you because you have food.”
author: unknown

quote: “Literally no one cares.”
author: unknown

quote: “Your dumb ass knew better and your dumb ass still did it.”
author: unknown

quote: “Hey, can you shut up? Asking for a friend.”

quote: “You’re the human equivalent of a typo.”

quote: “If your brains were dynamite there wouldn’t be enough to blow your hat off”

quote: “Hey, train wreck, this isn’t your station.”

quote: “You can be stupid or you can be loud. Please don’t be both.”

quote: “If I’ve ever offended you I’m sorry that you’re a little bi*ch.”

quote: “Talking is cool, but have you ever tried shutting the f..k up instead?”

quote: “If your phone battery lasts all day, it’s because no one likes you.”

quote: “Always remember you’re someone’s reason to smile because you’re a joke.”

quote: “It takes 37 muscles to frown but it only takes zero muscles to shut the f..k up.”

quote: “Give yourself an A for Average.”
author: unknown

quote: “You’re too old to be this stupid.”
author: unknown

quote: “You don’t have haters. No one knows who you are.”
author: unknown

quote: “If your coffee order is more than four words, you are part of the problem.”
author: unknown

quote: “Try not to talk so much, you’ll sound far less stupid that way.”

quote: “Have a mediocre weekend! You’ve earned it!”
author: unknown

quote: “You are a background character in a much more interesting person’s story.”
author: unknown

quote: Like our selection of best and funniest demotivational quotes? Share or pin it later! You can also stay in the loop and follow us on Facebook and Pinterest.
author: unknown

quote: “Happy people do not wake up for breakfast.”
author: Tetiana Liubetska

quote: “There are no stupid questions, but there are a LOT of inquisitive idiots.”
author: Justin Sewell

quote: “Nothing says "you're a loser" more than owning a motivational poster about being a winner.”
author: Justin Sewell

quote: If you're not a part of the solution, there's good money to be made in prolonging the problem.”
author: Justin Sewell

quote: “You can do anything you set your mind to when you have vision, determination, and an endless supply of expendable labor.”
author: Justin Sewell

quote: Every dead body on Mount Everest was once a highly motivated person. Stay lazy my friends. It may save your life one day.”
author: Oliver Markus Malloy

quote: “Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away.”
author: Paul Terry
